articles.title: OpenAI CFO Sees Firm Selling AI Infrastructure Service in Future
articles.summary: OpenAI is considering eventually helping other businesses tap into the data centers and physical infrastructure needed for artificial intelligence, potentially creating a new revenue line that could offset some of the ChatGPT maker’s immense costs.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI CFO Sees Firm Selling AI Infrastructure Service in Future
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI is considering eventually helping other businesses tap into the data centers and physical infrastructure needed for artificial intelligence, potentially creating a new revenue line that could offset some of the ChatGPT maker’s immense costs.

articles.title: Warren Brodey, 101, Dies; a Visionary at the Dawn of the Information Age
articles.summary: His work on complex systems and responsive technologies helped lay the groundwork for later work on artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Warren Brodey, 101, Dies; a Visionary at the Dawn of the Information Age
articles.translated_summary: His work on complex systems and responsive technologies helped lay the groundwork for later work on artificial intelligence.

articles.title: AI is changing how people travel
articles.summary: Travelers are using artificial intelligence to plan their trips. An expert says this shift is more than a trend. It’s the new normal.
articles.translated_title: AI is changing how people travel
articles.translated_summary: Travelers are using artificial intelligence to plan their trips. An expert says this shift is more than a trend. It’s the new normal.

articles.title: Google's Pixel 10 phones raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.summary: Google on Wednesday unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that’s designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they’re being taken.
articles.translated_title: Google's Pixel 10 phones raises the ante on artificial intelligence
articles.translated_summary: Google on Wednesday unveiled a new line-up of Pixel smartphones injected with another dose of artificial intelligence that’s designed to do everything from fetch vital information stored on the devices to help improve photos as they’re being taken.

articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg's pricey new AI hires are clashing with Meta's old guard
articles.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg reportedly blowing up his artificial intelligence empire, splitting the tech giant's AI division into four separate groups.
articles.translated_title: Mark Zuckerberg's pricey new AI hires are clashing with Meta's old guard
articles.translated_summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg reportedly blowing up his artificial intelligence empire, splitting the tech giant's AI division into four separate groups.

articles.title: Google unveils modest upgrades to Pixel smartphones, other gadgets
articles.summary: Alphabet’s Google introduced on Wednesday a new lineup of Pixel smartphones and gadgets, intensifying its efforts to embed artificial intelligence across a wide ecosystem of products.
articles.translated_title: Google unveils modest upgrades to Pixel smartphones, other gadgets
